<title level="1" right="Action">[Careful Withdraw](/Actions.aspx?ID=1045) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 72

</column>

---

The legchair carefully extricates you from a dangerous situation. It Steps twice and then Strides.
